short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada seeks to establish a standing offer for services related to heavy equipment for 4 locations.
description: The standing offer is to provide services related to heavy equipment at 4 Correctional Service institutions in Atlantic Canada. These services include excavation, snow removal, and clearance. Purchaser's Description: This requirement is for excavation services, snow removal and clearance services on an as and when required basis.
duration_in_months: This Standing Offer agreement is to be performed over a period of 32 months.
